name: Simpulator
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 97: Simulation

If your smoothness bar goes all the way down you lose, you win by getting your smoothness bar all the way up!

WASD to move

Kiss +75 points but can -50 points

Hug +50 but can - 50 points

Eye contact +15

High Five -15

Created by Tycrate1 and Thisismyapple

https://thisismyapple.itch.io/

https://tycrate1.itch.io/

Feedback would be appreciated
